sqlMap.select:
SELECT CC_ID ,CARD_SERIAL_NO ,MAIN_KEY ,SECURITY_KEY ,PIN_KEY ,MAC_KEY ,TRACK_KEY ,CCD_STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,SP_ID ,UPDATE_TIME ,EXT FROM CSTP_CSN_0365 WHERE 1=1 AND CSTP_CSN_0365.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(CC_ID) =#cc_id#
(CARD_SERIAL_NO) Like '%'||(#card_serial_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#main_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SECURITY_KEY) Like '%'||(#security_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#pin_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAC_KEY) Like '%'||(#mac_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACK_KEY) Like '%'||(#track_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CCD_STATUS) Like '%'||(#ccd_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SP_ID) Like '%'||(#sp_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPDATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#update_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM CSTP_CSN_0365 WHERE 1=1 AND CSTP_CSN_0365.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(CC_ID) =#cc_id#
(CARD_SERIAL_NO) Like '%'||(#card_serial_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#main_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SECURITY_KEY) Like '%'||(#security_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#pin_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAC_KEY) Like '%'||(#mac_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACK_KEY) Like '%'||(#track_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CCD_STATUS) Like '%'||(#ccd_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SP_ID) Like '%'||(#sp_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPDATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#update_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
